original_title: Keheliya and seven others further remanded
original_body_lines: Former Minister of Health Keheliya Rambukwella and 07 others have been further remanded until June 28 by the Maligakanda Magistrate’s Court over the import of substandard human Immunoglobulin vials.
This order was issued when the case was taken up before the Maligakanda Magistrate today (14).
